answers.answer: Hi, its difficult to explain why cold triggers bowel movements. Temperature intolerance can occur with hypothyroidism. Thyroid disorders also cause changes in bowel habits. Diabetes Mellitus and Hypothyroidism could cause the symptoms described by you. A simple blood test could help detect diabetes and hypothyroidism. Consult your primary care physician for these tests. Regards.

question: Can anyone explain why I always get severe abdominal cramping and have to run to the bathroom whenever I'm exposed to cold air. It can happen in air conditioning and in cold weather.
title: Cold air tummy trouble
